contentList.content:
Affected entity has gained [1].

As long as it has its temporary hit points, its melee weapon attacks and unarmed strikes deal an additional [2], and it deals double damage with Halo of Spores.

Ends early if the entity uses Wild Shape.
Wild Shape: Giant Badger
Wild Shape: Giant Wolf Spider
Wild Shape: Giant Spider
Wild Shape: Velociraptor
Wild Shape: Wolf
Wild Shape: Dire Wolf
Wild Shape: Eagle
Wild Shape: Owl
Wild Shape: Giant Eagle
Wild Shape: Giant Vulture
Wild Shape: Giant Hyena
Wild Shape: Black Bear
Wild Shape: Brown Bear
Wild Shape: Polar Bear
Wild Shape: Giant Elk
Keen Smell
You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
It has a starting health of [1] that increases over levels up to its maximum of [2].

Take the shape of a bear:
Level 4: Black Bear that can multi-attack. It has between [1] and [2] Hit Points.
Level 8: Brown Bear that can multi-attack. It has [3] Hit Points.

Take the shape of a bear:
Level 2: Brown Bear that can multi-attack. It has between [1] and [2] Hit Points.
Level 6: Polar Bear that can multi-attack. It has [3] Hit Points.

Take the shape of a wolf:
Level 2: Wolf that can knock Prone. It has between [1] and [2] Hit Points.
Level 8: Dire Wolf that can knock Prone. It has [3] Hit Points.

Take the shape of a spider:
Level 2: Giant Wolf Spider that can bite its target. It has between [1] and [2] Hit Points.
Level 8: Giant Spider Wolf that can bite and web its target. It has [3] Hit Points.
Take the shape of a giant badger that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_GiantBadger_Wildshape">multi-attack</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a cat.
Take the shape of a wolf that can knock <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a dire wolf that can knock <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a giant wolf spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_GiantWolfSpider_Wildshape">bite</LSTag> its target.

Take the shape of a giant spider that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_GiantSpider_Wildshape">bite</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Web_Spider_WildShape">web</LSTag> its target.
Take the shape of a velociraptor that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Velociraptor_Wildshape">multi-attack</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a giant hyena that can go <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Rampage">Rampage</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a panther that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Pounce_Panther_Summon">Pounce</LSTag> its target.
Take the shape of a sabre-toothed tiger that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Pounce_SaberToothTiger">Pounce</LSTag> its target.
Take the shape of a black bear that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Bear_Black_Wildshape">multi-attack</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a brown bear that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Bear_Brown_Wildshape">multi-attack</LSTag>.
Take the shape of a polar bear that can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Bear_Polar_Wildshape">multi-attack</LSTag>.
Bite a target and knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Bite a target and apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GIANT_WOLFSPIDER_POISON">poison</LSTag>.
Bite a target and apply <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GIANT_SPIDER_POISON">poison</LSTag>.
Spider Venom
Target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking [1] poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Leap at a target to hit it with a claw attack and knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PANTHER_POUNCE">Prone</LSTag>.

When the attacker <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">downs</LSTag> another creature with a melee attack, it can use a bonus action to move up to half its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> and make a bite attack.

Hit a target with a ranged attack. The target is restrained by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GIANT_SPIDER_WEB_DC12">webbing</LSTag>. As an action, the restrained target can try to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BurstWebbing_DC12">burst</LSTag> the webbing.
Burst the webbing
Burst the webbing with a successful Strength DC [1]
Web (Disadvantage)
